attributes.action: Garry sandhu should not be deported to india
attributes.additional_details: Garry sandhu an indian music artist should not be sent back to india. he is a great music artist and is a brilliant person. He has inspired all us youth in the uk and we all love him and his music. If he is sent back to india we wont hear his music and it would not be much appreciated back there. We all need him in the uk and his music..
